scripts.postpull: git checkout development &>/dev/null || git checkout -b development &> /dev/null && yarn >/dev/null 2>&1
scripts.commit: sh -c 'if [[ -n $(git status --porcelain) ]]; then git add . &> /dev/null && echo ${0} ${*} | git commit -aF - &> /dev/null && git push &> /dev/null; echo done; fi'
scripts.precommit: bun run --silent repo && bun run --silent postpull
scripts.deploy: sh -c 'git stash && git merge main -m Deploy; git commit -a -m "v$npm_package_version"; git push'
